job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly relates to modifying or enhancing the behavior of an AI system, which falls under the scope of model improvement and fine-tuning.

job_tasks.phrase: Review AI-generated solutions and provide detailed feedback and participate in AI model fine-tuning sessions
job_tasks.justification: The act of participating in 'AI model fine-tuning sessions' is a direct indication of working with and adjusting machine learning models.

job_tasks.phrase: Integrate technical human expertise and AI capabilities to deliver exceptional customer support
job_tasks.justification: This describes the process of combining different components (human expertise and AI capabilities) into a functional system for customer support, which is a software development task.

job_tasks.phrase: Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies
job_tasks.justification: Prototyping and testing new AI tools and methodologies indicates hands-on work with AI models and their underlying techniques.

soft_skills.phrase: Analyze complex tickets escalated by AI systems, apply human expertise to areas where AI falls short
ramp up one several products within the first month (we are aware this is aggressive)
if you are not adept at unblocking yourself, you will likely struggle in this role

classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on improving existing AI systems and reviewing AI outputs rather than building novel generative models. While there's an element of AI integration and testing, the core responsibilities lean more towards operational improvement and human-AI collaboration in a support context, not the core development or fine-tuning of GenAI models as defined.
